mapper.select: SELECT C.NAME, B.MERCHANT_UID, B.USER_NO, B.REVIEW_TITLE, B.REVIEW_CONTENT, B.REVIEW_DATE, B.REVIEW_STATUS FROM TICKETING A JOIN REVIEW B ON(A.MERCHANT_UID = B.MERCHANT_UID) JOIN USER_INFO C ON(B.USER_NO = C.USER_NO) WHERE EXHIBITION_NO = #{exhibitionNo} AND B.REVIEW_STATUS = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW(MERCHANT_UID, USER_NO, EXHIBITION_TITLE, REVIEW_TITLE, REVIEW_CONTENT , REVIEW_DATE, REVIEW_STATUS) VALUES(#{merchantUid}, #{userNo}, #{exhibitionTitle}, #{reviewTitle}, #{reviewContent} , SYSDATE, DEFAULT)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TICKETING A JOIN EXHIBITION B ON (A.EXHIBITION_NO = B.EXHIBITION_NO) WHERE A.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND A.VISIT_DATE < SYSDATE
